title: Rethinking ecosystem services from the anthropocene to the Ecozoic: Nature’s benefits to the biotic community
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 67

Author(s): Joshua Farley, Rigo E.M. Melgar, Danish Hasan Ansari, Matthew J. Burke, Julia Danielsen, Megan Egler, Lizah Makombore, Juliana Neira, Shashank Poudel, Shaun Sellers, Nina L. Smolyar, Joshua Sterlin, Joshua Taylor, Iván Darío Vargas Roncancio
